entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow near noon. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
